pages.text: $(bgreen)Gatling Pea$()'s parents were worried when he announced his intention to join the military. Gatling Pea refused to budge, although it's dangerous.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)250$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Very Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)range attack$() plant that shoots $(bred)four peas$() every 1.5 seconds to attack enemy.
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will shoot $(l)several peas each tick$() which last 10 seconds, and will shoot several $(l)big peas$() after super mode.
